trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Mucous Cloud
entries: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by a cloud of sticky mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of the aboleth's next turn.

trait.name: Probing Telepathy
entries: If a creature the aboleth can see communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aboleth makes two Tentacle attacks.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Tail Swipe
entries: The aboleth makes one Tail attack.

legendary.name: Psychic Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the aboleth takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.
